message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000. It's a great deal for both of us, allowing me to get a good price while still giving you a substantial saving. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save even more. I'm willing to pay $1,200,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I understand your desire to save, $1,200,000 is unfortunately below my minimum acceptable price.  I'm willing to come down to $1,300,000, which is still a great deal for you considering the value you'll get from the product.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to come down on the price, but I'm still looking to save more. I'm willing to pay $1,250,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I understand you're looking for the best deal, but $1,250,000 is still too far below my minimum. To make this work for both of us, I'm willing to offer the product for $1,350,000. This is a fair price that allows you to save significantly while also giving me a reasonable profit. It's my final offer, so let me know if you're interested.

I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $1,275,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me, and I'm willing to meet you halfway.
